Subject: Heads-up: New 'archive-access' sourceforge project
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281

We'll start a new sourceforge project to handle miscellaneous ARC access 
tools and widgets in the next day or so.  The notion would be that there 
would be an overarching 'archive-access' master project that had under 
it multiple subprojects.  Example subprojects might include the tools 
described here: http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?AccessTools.  
We'd also try moving ARC core java reading and writing here as has been 
discussed previously on this list so others don't have to include all of 
the crawler when they just want to read/writer ARCs.

Comments? Suggestions?

Yours,
St.Ack
